metadata.title: CVE-2022-45685 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A stack overflow in Jettison before v1.5.2 allows attackers to cause aDenial of Service (DoS) via crafted JSON data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjettison-java - 1.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libjettison-java package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
